title: (x) identify this font please / 'Team Trinity': sloppy uncial - Mael {Florian}
author: m3xican

comments.content: I’ll move this thread to the appropriate place, the [Type ID Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204043048/http:/typophile.com/typeid).

The font is a lousy freebie called [Mael](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204043048/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=mael&page=1&nb_ppp_old=50&text=Team+Trinity&nb_ppp=50&af=on&psize=m&classt=alpha).

For quality alternatives, check Dan’s posts on typeoff.de about this genre; [Gaelic and/or Uncial Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204043048/http:/www.typeoff.de/?p=107) and [More uncial typefaces!](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204043048/http:/www.typeoff.de/?p=183)  
F

One of my favourite uncials is [Solemnity](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204043048/http:/www.fontbros.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?preadd=action&key=HAFO-SOLE) (a.k.a. Solemnis) which is available for only twelve bucks!

- Lex
